name: accent-color
defenition: Specifies an accent color for user-interface controls

name: align-content
defenition: Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space

name: align-items
defenition: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container

name: align-self
defenition: Specifies the alignment for selected items inside a flexible container

name: all
defenition: Resets all properties (except unicode-bidi and direction)

name: animation
defenition: A shorthand property for all the animation-* properties

name: animation-delay
defenition: Specifies a delay for the start of an animation

name: animation-direction
defenition: Specifies whether an animation should be played forwards, backwards or in alternate cycles

name: animation-duration
defenition: Specifies how long an animation should take to complete one cycle

name: animation-fill-mode
defenition: Specifies a style for the element when the animation is not playing (before it starts, after it ends, or both)

name: animation-iteration-count
defenition: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played

name: animation-name
defenition: Specifies a name for the @keyframes animation

name: animation-play-state
defenition: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused

name: animation-timing-function
defenition: Specifies the speed curve of an animation

name: aspect-ratio
defenition: Specifies preferred aspect ratio of an element

name: backdrop-filter
defenition: Defines a graphical effect to the area behind an element

name: backface-visibility
defenition: Defines whether or not the back face of an element should be visible when facing the user

name: background
defenition: A shorthand property for all the background-* properties

name: background-attachment
defenition: Sets whether a background image scrolls with the rest of the page, or is fixed

name: background-blend-mode
defenition: Specifies the blending mode of each background layer (color/image)

name: background-clip
defenition: Defines how far the background (color or image) should extend within an element

name: background-color
defenition: Specifies the background color of an element

name: background-image
defenition: Specifies one or more background images for an element

name: background-origin
defenition: Specifies the origin position of a background image

name: background-position
defenition: Specifies the position of a background image

name: background-position-x
defenition: Specifies the position of a background image on x-axis

name: background-position-y
defenition: Specifies the position of a background image on y-axis

name: background-repeat
defenition: Sets if/how a background image will be repeated

name: background-size
defenition: Specifies the size of the background images

name: block-size
defenition: Specifies the size of an element in block direction

name: border
defenition: A shorthand property for border-width, border-style and border-color

name: border-block
defenition: A shorthand property for border-block-width, border-block-style and border-block-color

name: border-block-color
defenition: Sets the color of the borders at start and end in the block direction

name: border-block-end
defenition: A shorthand property for border-block-end-width, border-block-end-style and border-block-end-color

name: border-block-end-color
defenition: Sets the color of the border at the end in the block direction

name: border-block-end-style
defenition: Sets the style of the border at the end in the block direction

name: border-block-end-width
defenition: Sets the width of the border at the end in the block direction

name: border-block-start
defenition: A shorthand property for border-block-start-width, border-block-start-style and border-block-start-color

name: border-block-start-color
defenition: Sets the color of the border at the start in the block direction

name: border-block-start-style
defenition: Sets the style of the border at the start in the block direction

name: border-block-start-width
defenition: Sets the width of the border at the start in the block direction

name: border-block-style
defenition: Sets the style of the borders at start and end in the block direction

name: border-block-width
defenition: Sets the width of the borders at start and end in the block direction

name: border-bottom
defenition: A shorthand property for border-bottom-width, border-bottom-style and border-bottom-color

name: border-bottom-color
defenition: Sets the color of the bottom border

name: border-bottom-left-radius
defenition: Defines the radius of the border of the bottom-left corner

name: border-bottom-right-radius
defenition: Defines the radius of the border of the bottom-right corner

name: border-bottom-style
defenition: Sets the style of the bottom border

name: border-bottom-width
defenition: Sets the width of the bottom border

name: border-collapse
defenition: Sets whether table borders should collapse into a single border or be separated

name: border-color
defenition: Sets the color of the four borders

name: border-end-end-radius
defenition: Sets the radius of the corner between the block-end and the inline-end sides of the element

name: border-end-start-radius
defenition: Sets the radius of the corner between the block-end and the inline-start sides of the element

name: border-image
defenition: A shorthand property for all the border-image-* properties

name: border-image-outset
defenition: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

name: border-image-repeat
defenition: Specifies whether the border image should be repeated, rounded or stretched

name: border-image-slice
defenition: Specifies how to slice the border image

name: border-image-source
defenition: Specifies the path to the image to be used as a border

name: border-image-width
defenition: Specifies the width of the border image

name: border-inline
defenition: A shorthand property for border-inline-width, border-inline-style and border-inline-color

name: border-inline-color
defenition: Sets the color of the borders at start and end in the inline direction

name: border-inline-end
defenition: A shorthand property for border-inline-end-width, border-inline-end-style and border-inline-end-color

name: border-inline-end-color
defenition: Sets the color of the border at the end in the inline direction

name: border-inline-end-style
defenition: Sets the style of the border at the end in the inline direction

name: border-inline-end-width
defenition: Sets the width of the border at the end in the inline direction

name: border-inline-start
defenition: A shorthand property for border-inline-start-width, border-inline-start-style and border-inline-start-color

name: border-inline-start-color
defenition: Sets the color of the border at the start in the inline direction

name: border-inline-start-style
defenition: Sets the style of the border at the start in the inline direction

name: border-inline-start-width
defenition: Sets the width of the border at the start in the inline direction

name: border-inline-style
defenition: Sets the style of the borders at start and end in the inline direction

name: border-inline-width
defenition: Sets the width of the borders at start and end in the inline direction

name: border-left
defenition: A shorthand property for all the border-left-* properties

name: border-left-color
defenition: Sets the color of the left border

name: border-left-style
defenition: Sets the style of the left border

name: border-left-width
defenition: Sets the width of the left border

name: border-radius
defenition: A shorthand property for the four border-*-radius properties

name: border-right
defenition: A shorthand property for all the border-right-* properties

name: border-right-color
defenition: Sets the color of the right border

name: border-right-style
defenition: Sets the style of the right border

name: border-right-width
defenition: Sets the width of the right border

name: border-spacing
defenition: Sets the distance between the borders of adjacent cells

name: border-start-end-radius
defenition: Sets the radius of the corner between the block-start and the inline-end sides of the element

name: border-start-start-radius
defenition: Sets the radius of the corner between the block-start and the inline-start sides of the element

name: border-style
defenition: Sets the style of the four borders

name: border-top
defenition: A shorthand property for border-top-width, border-top-style and border-top-color

name: border-top-color
defenition: Sets the color of the top border

name: border-top-left-radius
defenition: Defines the radius of the border of the top-left corner

name: border-top-right-radius
defenition: Defines the radius of the border of the top-right corner

name: border-top-style
defenition: Sets the style of the top border

name: border-top-width
defenition: Sets the width of the top border

name: border-width
defenition: Sets the width of the four borders

name: bottom
defenition: Sets the elements position, from the bottom of its parent element

name: box-decoration-break
defenition: Sets the behavior of the background and border of an element at page-break, or, for in-line elements, at line-break.

name: box-reflect
defenition: The box-reflect property is used to create a reflection of an element.

name: box-shadow
defenition: Attaches one or more shadows to an element

name: box-sizing
defenition: Defines how the width and height of an element are calculated: should they include padding and borders, or not

name: break-after
defenition: Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur after the specified element

name: break-before
defenition: Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur before the specified element

name: break-inside
defenition: Specifies whether or not a page-, column-, or region-break should occur inside the specified element

name: caption-side
defenition: Specifies the placement of a table caption

name: caret-color
defenition: Specifies the color of the cursor (caret) in inputs, textareas, or any element that is editable

name: clear
defenition: Specifies what should happen with the element that is next to a floating element

name: clip-path
defenition: Clips an element to a basic shape or to an SVG source

name: color
defenition: Sets the color of text

name: color-scheme
defenition: Indicates which operating system color scheme an element should render with

name: column-count
defenition: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into

name: column-fill
defenition: Specifies how to fill columns, balanced or not

name: column-gap
defenition: Specifies the gap between the columns

name: column-rule
defenition: A shorthand property for all the column-rule-* properties

name: column-rule-color
defenition: Specifies the color of the rule between columns

name: column-rule-style
defenition: Specifies the style of the rule between columns

name: column-rule-width
defenition: Specifies the width of the rule between columns

name: column-span
defenition: Specifies how many columns an element should span across

name: column-width
defenition: Specifies the column width

name: columns
defenition: A shorthand property for column-width and column-count

name: content
defenition: Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements, to insert generated content

name: counter-increment
defenition: Increases or decreases the value of one or more CSS counters

name: counter-reset
defenition: Creates or resets one or more CSS counters

name: counter-set
defenition: Creates or sets one or more CSS counters

name: cursor
defenition: Specifies the mouse cursor to be displayed when pointing over an element

name: direction
defenition: Specifies the text direction/writing direction

name: display
defenition: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed

name: empty-cells
defenition: Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table

name: filter
defenition: Defines effects (e.g. blurring or color shifting) on an element before the element is displayed

name: flex
defenition: A shorthand property for the flex-grow, flex-shrink, and the flex-basis properties

name: flex-basis
defenition: Specifies the initial length of a flexible item

name: flex-direction
defenition: Specifies the direction of the flexible items

name: flex-flow
defenition: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties

name: flex-grow
defenition: Specifies how much the item will grow relative to the rest

name: flex-shrink
defenition: Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest

name: flex-wrap
defenition: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not

name: float
defenition: Specifies whether an element should float to the left, right, or not at all

name: font
defenition: A shorthand property for the font-style, font-variant, font-weight, font-size/line-height, and the font-family properties

name: font-family
defenition: Specifies the font family for text

name: font-feature-settings
defenition: Allows control over advanced typographic features in OpenType fonts

name: font-kerning
defenition: Controls the usage of the kerning information (how letters are spaced)

name: font-language-override
defenition: Controls the usage of language-specific glyphs in a typeface

name: font-size
defenition: Specifies the font size of text

name: font-size-adjust
defenition: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs

name: font-stretch
defenition: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family

name: font-style
defenition: Specifies the font style for text

name: font-synthesis
defenition: Controls which missing typefaces (bold or italic) may be synthesized by the browser

name: font-variant
defenition: Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font

name: font-variant-alternates
defenition: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs associated to alternative names defined in @font-feature-values

name: font-variant-caps
defenition: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for capital letters

name: font-variant-east-asian
defenition: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for East Asian scripts (e.g Japanese and Chinese)

name: font-variant-ligatures
defenition: Controls which ligatures and contextual forms are used in textual content of the elements it applies to

name: font-variant-numeric
defenition: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for numbers, fractions, and ordinal markers

name: font-variant-position
defenition: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs of smaller size positioned as superscript or subscript regarding the baseline of the font

name: font-weight
defenition: Specifies the weight of a font

name: gap
defenition: A shorthand property for the row-gap and the column-gap properties

name: grid
defenition: A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns, grid-template-areas, grid-auto-rows, grid-auto-columns, and the grid-auto-flow properties

name: grid-area
defenition: Either specifies a name for the grid item, or this property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end, and grid-column-end properties

name: grid-auto-columns
defenition: Specifies a default column size

name: grid-auto-flow
defenition: Specifies how auto-placed items are inserted in the grid

name: grid-auto-rows
defenition: Specifies a default row size

name: grid-column
defenition: A shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties

name: grid-column-end
defenition: Specifies where to end the grid item

name: grid-column-start
defenition: Specifies where to start the grid item

name: grid-row
defenition: A shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties

name: grid-row-end
defenition: Specifies where to end the grid item

name: grid-row-start
defenition: Specifies where to start the grid item

name: grid-template
defenition: A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns and grid-areas properties

name: grid-template-areas
defenition: Specifies how to display columns and rows, using named grid items

name: grid-template-columns
defenition: Specifies the size of the columns, and how many columns in a grid layout

name: grid-template-rows
defenition: Specifies the size of the rows in a grid layout

name: hanging-punctuation
defenition: Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box

name: height
defenition: Sets the height of an element

name: hyphens
defenition: Sets how to split words to improve the layout of text

name: image-rendering
defenition: Specifies the type of algorithm to use for image scaling

name: inline-size
defenition: Specifies the size of an element in the inline direction

name: inset
defenition: Specifies the distance between an element and the parent element

name: inset-block
defenition: Specifies the distance between an element and the parent element in the block direction

name: inset-block-end
defenition: Specifies the distance between the end of an element and the parent element in the block direction

name: inset-block-start
defenition: Specifies the distance between the start of an element and the parent element in the block direction

name: inset-inline
defenition: Specifies the distance between an element and the parent element in the inline direction

name: inset-inline-end
defenition: Specifies the distance between the end of an element and the parent element in the inline direction

name: inset-inline-start
defenition: Specifies the distance between the start of an element and the parent element in the inline direction

name: isolation
defenition: Defines whether an element must create a new stacking content

name: justify-content
defenition: Specifies the alignment between the items inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space

name: justify-items
defenition: Is set on the grid container. Specifies the alignment of grid items in the inline direction

name: justify-self
defenition: Is set on the grid item. Specifies the alignment of the grid item in the inline direction

name: left
defenition: Specifies the left position of a positioned element

name: letter-spacing
defenition: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text

name: line-break
defenition: Specifies how/if to break lines

name: line-height
defenition: Sets the line height

name: list-style
defenition: Sets all the properties for a list in one declaration

name: list-style-image
defenition: Specifies an image as the list-item marker

name: list-style-position
defenition: Specifies the position of the list-item markers (bullet points)

name: list-style-type
defenition: Specifies the type of list-item marker

name: margin
defenition: Sets all the margin properties in one declaration

name: margin-block
defenition: Specifies the margin in the block direction

name: margin-block-end
defenition: Specifies the margin at the end in the block direction

name: margin-block-start
defenition: Specifies the margin at the start in the block direction

name: margin-bottom
defenition: Sets the bottom margin of an element

name: margin-inline
defenition: Specifies the margin in the inline direction

name: margin-inline-end
defenition: Specifies the margin at the end in the inline direction

name: margin-inline-start
defenition: Specifies the margin at the start in the inline direction

name: margin-left
defenition: Sets the left margin of an element

name: margin-right
defenition: Sets the right margin of an element

name: margin-top
defenition: Sets the top margin of an element

name: mask
defenition: Hides parts of an element by masking or clipping an image at specific places

name: mask-clip
defenition: Specifies the mask area

name: mask-composite
defenition: Represents a compositing operation used on the current mask layer with the mask layers below it

name: mask-image
defenition: Specifies an image to be used as a mask layer for an element

name: mask-mode
defenition: Specifies whether the mask layer image is treated as a luminance mask or as an alpha mask

name: mask-origin
defenition: Specifies the origin position (the mask position area) of a mask layer image

name: mask-position
defenition: Sets the starting position of a mask layer image (relative to the mask position area)

name: mask-repeat
defenition: Specifies how the mask layer image is repeated

name: mask-size
defenition: Specifies the size of a mask layer image

name: mask-type
defenition: Specifies whether an SVG <mask> element is treated as a luminance mask or as an alpha mask

name: max-height
defenition: Sets the maximum height of an element

name: max-width
defenition: Sets the maximum width of an element

name: max-block-size
defenition: Sets the maximum size of an element in the block direction

name: max-inline-size
defenition: Sets the maximum size of an element in the inline direction

name: min-block-size
defenition: Sets the minimum size of an element in the block direction

name: min-inline-size
defenition: Sets the minimum size of an element in the inline direction

name: min-height
defenition: Sets the minimum height of an element

name: min-width
defenition: Sets the minimum width of an element

name: mix-blend-mode
defenition: Specifies how an element's content should blend with its direct parent background

name: object-fit
defenition: Specifies how the contents of a replaced element should be fitted to the box established by its used height and width

name: object-position
defenition: Specifies the alignment of the replaced element inside its box

name: offset
defenition: Is a shorthand, and specifies how to animate an element along a path

name: offset-anchor
defenition: Specifies a point on an element that is fixed to the path it is animated along

name: offset-distance
defenition: Specifies the position along a path where an animated element is placed

name: offset-path
defenition: Specifies the path an element is animated along

name: offset-rotate
defenition: Specifies rotation of an element as it is animated along a path

name: opacity
defenition: Sets the opacity level for an element

name: order
defenition: Sets the order of the flexible item, relative to the rest

name: orphans
defenition: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a page or column

name: outline
defenition: A shorthand property for the outline-width, outline-style, and the outline-color properties

name: outline-color
defenition: Sets the color of an outline

name: outline-offset
defenition: Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge

name: outline-style
defenition: Sets the style of an outline

name: outline-width
defenition: Sets the width of an outline

name: overflow
defenition: Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box

name: overflow-anchor
defenition: Specifies whether or not content in viewable area in a scrollable contianer should be pushed down when new content is loaded above

name: overflow-wrap
defenition: Specifies whether or not the browser can break lines with long words, if they overflow the container

name: overflow-x
defenition: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

name: overflow-y
defenition: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

name: overscroll-behavior
defenition: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in x- and y-directions

name: overscroll-behavior-block
defenition: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in the block direction

name: overscroll-behavior-inline
defenition: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in the inline direction

name: overscroll-behavior-x
defenition: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in x-direction

name: overscroll-behavior-y
defenition: Specifies whether to have scroll chaining or overscroll affordance in y-directions

name: padding
defenition: A shorthand property for all the padding-* properties

name: padding-block
defenition: Specifies the padding in the block direction

name: padding-block-end
defenition: Specifies the padding at the end in the block direction

name: padding-block-start
defenition: Specifies the padding at the start in the block direction

name: padding-bottom
defenition: Sets the bottom padding of an element

name: padding-inline
defenition: Specifies the padding in the inline direction

name: padding-inline-end
defenition: Specifies the padding at the end in the inline direction

name: padding-inline-start
defenition: Specifies the padding at the start in the inline direction

name: padding-left
defenition: Sets the left padding of an element

name: padding-right
defenition: Sets the right padding of an element

name: padding-top
defenition: Sets the top padding of an element

name: page-break-after
defenition: Sets the page-break behavior after an element

name: page-break-before
defenition: Sets the page-break behavior before an element

name: page-break-inside
defenition: Sets the page-break behavior inside an element

name: paint-order
defenition: Sets the order of how an SVG element or text is painted.

name: perspective
defenition: Gives a 3D-positioned element some perspective

name: perspective-origin
defenition: Defines at which position the user is looking at the 3D-positioned element

name: place-content
defenition: Specifies align-content and justify-content property values for flexbox and grid layouts

name: place-items
defenition: Specifies align-items and justify-items property values for grid layouts

name: place-self
defenition: Specifies align-self and justify-self property values for grid layouts

name: pointer-events
defenition: Defines whether or not an element reacts to pointer events

name: position
defenition: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)

name: quotes
defenition: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations

name: resize
defenition: Defines if (and how) an element is resizable by the user

name: right
defenition: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

name: rotate
defenition: Specifies the rotation of an element

name: row-gap
defenition: Specifies the gap between the grid rows

name: scale
defenition: Specifies the size of an element by scaling up or down

name: scroll-behavior
defenition: Specifies whether to smoothly animate the scroll position in a scrollable box, instead of a straight jump

name: scroll-margin
defenition: Specifies the margin between the snap position and the container

name: scroll-margin-block
defenition: Specifies the margin between the snap position and the container in the block direction

name: scroll-margin-block-end
defenition: Specifies the end margin between the snap position and the container in the block direction

name: scroll-margin-block-start
defenition: Specifies the start margin between the snap position and the container in the block direction

name: scroll-margin-bottom
defenition: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the bottom side and the container

name: scroll-margin-inline
defenition: Specifies the margin between the snap position and the container in the inline direction

name: scroll-margin-inline-end
defenition: Specifies the end margin between the snap position and the container in the inline direction

name: scroll-margin-inline-start
defenition: Specifies the start margin between the snap position and the container in the inline direction

name: scroll-margin-left
defenition: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the left side and the container

name: scroll-margin-right
defenition: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the right side and the container

name: scroll-margin-top
defenition: Specifies the margin between the snap position on the top side and the container

name: scroll-padding
defenition: Specifies the distance from the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-block
defenition: Specifies the distance in block direction from the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-block-end
defenition: Specifies the distance in block direction from the end of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-block-start
defenition: Specifies the distance in block direction from the start of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-bottom
defenition: Specifies the distance from the bottom of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-inline
defenition: Specifies the distance in inline direction from the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-inline-end
defenition: Specifies the distance in inline direction from the end of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-inline-start
defenition: Specifies the distance in inline direction from the start of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-left
defenition: Specifies the distance from the left side of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-right
defenition: Specifies the distance from the right side of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-padding-top
defenition: Specifies the distance from the top of the container to the snap position on the child elements

name: scroll-snap-align
defenition: Specifies where to position elements when the user stops scrolling

name: scroll-snap-stop
defenition: Specifies scroll behaviour after fast swipe on trackpad or touch screen

name: scroll-snap-type
defenition: Specifies how snap behaviour should be when scrolling

name: scrollbar-color
defenition: Specifies the color of the scrollbar of an element

name: tab-size
defenition: Specifies the width of a tab character

name: table-layout
defenition: Defines the algorithm used to lay out table cells, rows, and columns

name: text-align
defenition: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text

name: text-align-last
defenition: Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when text-align is "justify"

name: text-combine-upright
defenition: Specifies the combination of multiple characters into the space of a single character

name: text-decoration
defenition: Specifies the decoration added to text

name: text-decoration-color
defenition: Specifies the color of the text-decoration

name: text-decoration-line
defenition: Specifies the type of line in a text-decoration

name: text-decoration-style
defenition: Specifies the style of the line in a text decoration

name: text-decoration-thickness
defenition: Specifies the thickness of the decoration line

name: text-emphasis
defenition: A shorthand property for the text-emphasis-style and text-emphasis-color properties

name: text-emphasis-color
defenition: Specifies the color of emphasis marks

name: text-emphasis-position
defenition: Specifies the position of emphasis marks

name: text-emphasis-style
defenition: Specifies the style of emphasis marks

name: text-indent
defenition: Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block

name: text-justify
defenition: Specifies the justification method used when text-align is "justify"

name: text-orientation
defenition: Defines the orientation of characters in a line

name: text-overflow
defenition: Specifies what should happen when text overflows the containing element

name: text-shadow
defenition: Adds shadow to text

name: text-transform
defenition: Controls the capitalization of text

name: text-underline-offset
defenition: Specifies the offset distance of the underline text decoration

name: text-underline-position
defenition: Specifies the position of the underline text decoration

name: top
defenition: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

name: transform
defenition: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element

name: transform-origin
defenition: Allows you to change the position on transformed elements

name: transform-style
defenition: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space

name: transition
defenition: A shorthand property for all the transition-* properties

name: transition-delay
defenition: Specifies when the transition effect will start

name: transition-duration
defenition: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete

name: transition-property
defenition: Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for

name: transition-timing-function
defenition: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect

name: translate
defenition: Specifies the position of an element

name: unicode-bidi
defenition: Used together with the direction property to set or return whether the text should be overridden to support multiple languages in the same document

name: user-select
defenition: Specifies whether the text of an element can be selected

name: vertical-align
defenition: Sets the vertical alignment of an element

name: visibility
defenition: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

name: white-space
defenition: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled

name: widows
defenition: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the top of a page or column

name: width
defenition: Sets the width of an element

name: word-break
defenition: Specifies how words should break when reaching the end of a line

name: word-spacing
defenition: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text

name: word-wrap
defenition: Allows long, unbreakable words to be broken and wrap to the next line

name: writing-mode
defenition: Specifies whether lines of text are laid out horizontally or vertically

name: writing-mode
defenition: Sets the stack order of a positioned element
